name: Jacques Boomer's Garden
description: Help Jacques Boomer to harvest carrots from his vegetable garden. First of all, you have to water them (space bar) and wait for them to grow. Beware of the promoter who wants to expropriate Jacques, the workers who are there to destroy the garden, and the mini Godzillus who are there to take over the world. If you have enough energy, you can knock them off their platform by pushing them [arrow keys] - Esc to restart - L to go to the next level.
